features: Upgraded Metal Hook: Car phone holder mount features an upgraded metal hook with a thick plastic layer wrapped around outside which firmly locking the vent blades without scratches. The iPhone car mount is compatible with both horizontal and vertical vents, ensures stable even on sharp turns or bumpy roads.

Strong Stability: Phone stand for car comes with an upgraded adjustable arms and an adjustable foot which is suitable for larger phones and thicker cases. The extra thick airbag silicone layer clip arms provides a stable grip and protection, ensure your iPhone is scratch-free.

360-Degree Adjustable: iPhone holder for Car has a 360 degree rotatable design that switches between horizontal and vertical angles at will, giving you the best view angle of your driving at all times. Ideal for on-the-go navigation.
Easy to install: Phone holder for car is equipped with a one-touch release button for quick installation in seconds. Ensure your driving safety on the road.

High compatibility: Car phone holder fits iPhone 14 13 12 Pro Max Samsung Andriod and all cell phones from 4 .0 inches to 7.1 inches. Car mount for iPhone is suitable for most cars, pick-up trucks, SUVs, taxis. Perfect assistant for Uber, Lyft drivers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about this mount because frankly it looked cheap and I’ve had a lot of flimsy items I order break within a week. Everyone’s experience is different, but here’s my two cents:CONVENIENT SET-UP/ USEAt the time I ordered this I was an Uber driver, so it was super important for me to be able to use my phone quickly take it in and out of the mount and also have high visibility. I had seen cupholder mounts, dashboard, sticky mounts, windshield suction, cup mounts, but from what I could tell the easiest, most reliable, and, least damaging to the car is the AC mount. That proved to be extremely true in using this mount, the set up took me less than two minutes and almost a year later I have never had a single issue. (The only thing to consider that might break it is either over-tightening when you’re setting it up initially or if you don’t use the back button to unlock the sides of the phone or tighten the fastener too much for the most part it’s not an issue as long as you’re even remotely careful)VALUELike I said, I’ve gotten a lot of crap that breaks within a week, this is lasted me almost a year. Even though the plastic feels like it could break pretty easily, I’ve never had a problem. There were other mounts that were way more expensive and because naturally, anyone would think that more expensive entire quality, I originally looked at those, but after buying a few, with the intent to figure out, which is the best, this actually stacked at the top because it’s the most practical being non-electrical, easy, and cheap.MY ONLY POINT FOR IMPROVEMENTIf you live somewhere hot, and you’ll have your AC blowing constantly, this might not be the amount for you. For a short period of time I was living in Texas, and when I was constantly using the AC to beat the heat, anytime I was on the phone with someone all they could hear is a blasting. All things considered, not a huge con to have)All in all, I would 10 out of 10 recommend to purchase. Came back here to buy one for my girlfriend and decided I had to leave a review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Telephone Holder
reviews.reviewText: Only occasionally will something work as intended. I have a 1986 Buick Electra Park Avenue that, when it was manufactured, the designers at General Motors never dreamed of things like cupholders or cell phone holders. So, these now considered basic items of convenience have to be somehow added to the interior of the vehicle. The cupholders were easy but the cell phone holder was a much greater challenge. I tried the suction cup. It could hold 5,000 lbs of weight for about a minute and then about 5 minutes later it comes right off. I tried gluing a homemade holder on but it wouldn't stick and it also messed up the dashboard. Finally, I decided to try this unit and it works perfectly. The secret is in the hook which connects to the vent outlet. That appears to be a very sturdy part of the dashboard and this when connected to it, seems to hold the weight of the phone easily.I am very pleased with this unit and would recommend it to anyone who might have run out of other ideas as to how to mount their phones so they are not bouncing around everywhere in the vehicle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Clacking sound sometimes when the road gets bumpy
reviews.reviewText: Relatively easy to install. Took me a little bit to figure out. It doesn't fall off and fits my air vents which is great. Pretty stable thing, makes noises sometimes when the road gets bumpy though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Well designed and constructed it fit my car's grill perfectly and holds the phone tightly. Easy to adjust the view. Highly recommended and will be buying one for the second car.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does not lose suction
reviews.reviewText: Many of these iPhone mounts use suction and inevitably they lose suction and I have to throw them away. This one works great. It is extremely easy to mount with the clip on your air conditioning vent. On my car, this unit allows the phone easy access to charger and allows me access to all the knobs on the car's "control panel".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only holder that actually works in all the rental cars when traveling.
reviews.reviewText: This holder rocks. I've used a bunch over the years and this is the only one that I consider practical. It hooks into most air vents and you can lock it down so it's sturdy. Fits both horizontal and vertical air vents, and you don't have to deal with suction-cups failing in the hot sun, or failing grip-clips that don't fit in narrower air vents.I take this with me traveling and it's worked in every rental car well enough, and I use it in my own car too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Doesn't hold the phone well and hard to get it off on press
reviews.reviewText: The suction power of this thing is not a reliable one. There were few occasions it would fail holding the phone and let it fly out of the handle when in some car brake instances. There's also the aspect of it that it's not easy to release the phone from the mount since I had to spam press the release button from the back like 4-5 times to get my phone off the mount instead of long pressing (it takes like 4-5 seconds more to do that, ain't nobody got time for that!)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and works!
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful product and is easy to set up.
Très pratique et facile à poser. Il ne tombe pas comme mon ancien support
Cumple bien su función, es fácil de instalar y sujeta bien el teléfono
Ne tiens pas bien et abîme la grille d’aération

Die Anbringung war super und einfach! Jetzt ist alles super gelöst mit dem Handy Halter, er ist fest und das Handling klappt super. Genau das richtige Produkt für mich und mein Fahrzeug um das Mobiltelefon im Auto effektiv nutzen können.

reviews.reviewTitle: CINDRO Porta Cellulare Auto: pratico e sicuro, per un'esperienza di guida senza distrazioni
reviews.reviewText: Stavo cercando un porta cellulare per auto che sia pratico e sicuro, in modo da poter utilizzare il mio telefono senza distrazioni durante la guida. Dopo aver letto le recensioni positive, ho deciso di provare il CINDRO Porta Cellulare Auto.Il porta cellulare è realizzato in materiale di alta qualità e ha una struttura robusta. La clip a gancio è in grado di sostenere telefoni di dimensioni fino a 7 pollici. Il supporto è regolabile a 360 gradi, in modo da poter posizionare il telefono nella posizione più comoda.Il porta cellulare è facile da installare e da usare. La clip a gancio si aggancia saldamente al cruscotto o alla bocchetta dell'aria dell'auto. Il supporto è stabile e non si muove durante la guida.Sono rimasto molto soddisfatto del CINDRO Porta Cellulare Auto. È un prodotto pratico e sicuro, che mi permette di utilizzare il mio telefono in modo sicuro durante la guida. Lo consiglio a chiunque cerchi un porta cellulare per auto di alta qualità.
